title: Unable to change my email, password or login into the game
body:
Whenever I go to login to the game it prompts me to change my password, when I go to change my password I just get a loading emblem and it never changes. I'm not able to verify my email either. All I see is "an error occured" in a red box. When I go to login to support it tells me to verify my email, but I never receive an email.

Any assistance wouldn't be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: I just got work that the Support Site was having a few problems and players weren't able to access it or change their passwords. I reach out to some people and it should be fixed now, but if not you can shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to help out with updating your account.
